entries.title: The Art of Slowing Down
entries.thoughts: This article resonated deeply with me. In our hustle culture, we often forget that quality thinking requires space and time. The author's point about 'productive laziness' really stuck with me.

entries.title: How to Build Products Users Love
entries.thoughts: Great framework for thinking about product-market fit. The emphasis on talking to users before building is something I need to practice more.

entries.title: Atomic Habits
entries.thoughts: Finally finished this! The 1% better every day concept is powerful. I'm implementing habit stacking for my morning routine.

entries.title: Lenny's Podcast: Product Lessons
entries.thoughts: The guest shared incredible insights about building B2B products. Key takeaway: enterprise sales is about understanding the buyer's internal politics.

entries.title: Weekly Tech Roundup
entries.thoughts: Ben Thompson's analysis of the AI landscape is always insightful. His framework for thinking about aggregation theory in AI is worth revisiting.
